title: Omelet
ingredients: 2 slices of ham (cut into small pieces)

directions.text: Whisk together 3 whole eggs, one egg yolk, milk, salt, and pepper.
Let sit for at least 15 mins.
Mix in the ham, mushrooms, shallot and ⅔rds of the butter.
Melt the remaining butter in an 8" skillet over low heat.
Add egg mixture and scrap slowly and constantly, occasionally lifting to allow liquids under solids.
When egg mixture is firm, cover and remove from heat for 1 min.
Flip the egg in half onto itself.
